titles.title: Hotel Advertising Transparency Act of 2022
Hotel Advertising Transparency Act of 2022
To prohibit unfair and deceptive advertising of rates for hotel rooms and other places of short-term lodging.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Hotel Advertising Transparency Act of 2022 This bill requires hotels, and other places of short-term lodging, to include all required fees in the advertised rate.
This requirement may be enforced by the Federal Trade Commission, state attorneys general, and other authorized state officials.
